Package EigenMeat.EigenMaze

Interface Summary
Drawable Provides a way for an object to draw itself in an OpenGL context.
MobileEntity Classifies an object as a movable game entity.
NetEntity Interface for the network code.
 

Class Summary
Camera Rendering camera object - point of view.
Connection Client connection to a server.
DisplayHandler The DisplayHandler represents a rectangular view of the game world, and controls the drawing of its contents.
EigenEngine This is the facade for the entire engine.
EigenKey In the process of making this a subclass of Server.
EigenMaze Entry point of game.
Entity Base class for any independent game world object.
EntityFactory An EntityFactory will store lists of different types of entities loaded by the SoftLoader.
Flag Flag object for multiplayer game types.
Game The class that run the engine and links it to an interface.
GLExtensions Class to query OpenGL Extensions.
LightManager Light manager.
Lightmap Class to create lightmap textures.
MassEntity Entity that has mass.
Math3D 3d math methods.
Matrix Matrix class for matrix operations
Maze Creates a random maze.
Maze3d Draws a Maze in 3d.
Mesh A Mesh contains vertex and triangle data of a three-dimensional object suitable for drawing into the engine.
MeshLoader A factory class for creating standard meshes.
NetHandler This is the primary network subsystem.
NetProjectileManager This object manages projectiles across a net game.
Octree Octree data structure for static triangle data
Particle A single Particle for the particle engine.
ParticleEffect An effect consisting of particles.
ParticleManager The class that handles the creation, movement, and destruction of particles.
ParticleSphere A single Particle for the particle engine.
Physics A utility class with static methods for mobile collision handling.
Plane Helper class for various triangle-based algorithms.
Player The locally-controlled player.
Powerup A Powerup entity that increases a Ship's shields on collision.
Preferences Preferences is a singleton soft-loaded class that contains values of global engine variables that are usually hardcoded.
Projectile Basic class for any projectiles.
ProjectileLauncher Projectile Launcher object
Server The server used to host a game.
ShadowVolume A class to help in the creation and updating of shadow volumes.
Ship Ship object.
ShortMap A collection that maps an arbitrary short to an Object.
SkyBox A Sky Box Object that simulates scenery
Texture Manages a single texture.
Vect3d XYZ Vector class.
